Name: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Crime | Drama | Family | Mystery | Romance | Sci-Fi | Thriller

Outline: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

Name: Taken

Outline: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.

Name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo

Name: Gravity

Name: Confessions

Outline: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

Name: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
Credit: Dir: Mamoru Oshii With: Akio Ãtsuka, Atsuko Tanaka, Tamio Ãki
Outline: In the year 2032, BatÃ´, a cyborg detective for the anti-terrorist unit Public Security Section 9, investigates the case of a female robot--one created solely for sexual pleasure--who slaughtered her owner.

Name: Munich

Name: Backdraft
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Kurt Russell, William Baldwin, Robert De Niro
Outline: Two Chicago firefighter brothers who don't get along have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

Name: The Good Shepherd
Credit: Dir: Robert De Niro With: Matt Damon, Angelina Jolie, Robert De Niro
Outline: The tumultuous early history of the Central Intelligence Agency is viewed through the prism of one man's life.

Name: Kalifornia
Credit: Dir: Dominic Sena With: Brad Pitt, Juliette Lewis, Kathy Larson
Outline: A journalist duo go on a tour of serial killer murder sites with two companions, unaware that one of them is a serial killer himself.

Name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
Credit: Dir: Francis Lawrence With: Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth
Outline: Katniss Everdeen is in District 13 after she shatters the games forever. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss spreads her wings as she fights to save Peeta and a nation moved by her courage.

Name: The Exorcism of Emily Rose
Credit: Dir: Scott Derrickson With: Laura Linney, Tom Wilkinson, Shohreh Aghdashloo
Outline: A lawyer takes on a negligent homicide case involving a priest who performed an exorcism on a young girl.

Name: Killer Joe
Credit: Dir: William Friedkin With: Matthew McConaughey, Emile Hirsch, Juno Temple
Outline: When a debt puts a young man's life in danger, he turns to putting a hit out on his evil mother in order to collect the insurance.

Name: Wanted
Credit: Dir: Timur Bekmambetov With: Angelina Jolie, James McAvoy, Morgan Freeman
Outline: A frustrated office worker learns that he is the son of a professional assassin, and that he shares his father's superhuman killing abilities.

Name: Transsiberian
Credit: Dir: Brad Anderson With: Woody Harrelson, Emily Mortimer, Ben Kingsley
Outline: A Trans-Siberian train journey from China to Moscow becomes a thrilling chase of deception and murder when an American couple encounters a mysterious pair of fellow travelers.

Name: The Client
Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Susan Sarandon, Tommy Lee Jones, Brad Renfro
Outline: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the district attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.

Name: Angels & Demons
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Tom Hanks, Ewan McGregor, Ayelet Zurer
Outline: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon works to solve a murder and prevent a terrorist act against the Vatican.

Name: The Living Daylights
Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Timothy Dalton, Maryam d'Abo, Jeroen KrabbÃ©
Outline: James Bond is living on the edge to stop an evil arms dealer from starting another world war. Bond crosses all seven continents in order to stop the evil Whitaker and General Koskov.

Name: The Guest
Credit: Dir: Adam Wingard With: Dan Stevens, Sheila Kelley, Maika Monroe
Outline: A soldier introduces himself to the Peterson family, claiming to be a friend of their son who died in action. After the young man is welcomed into their home, a series of accidental deaths seem to be connected to his presence.

Name: The Rundown
Credit: Dir: Peter Berg With: Dwayne Johnson, Seann William Scott, Christopher Walken
Outline: A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure.

Name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
Credit: Dir: Gavin Hood With: Hugh Jackman, Liev Schreiber, Ryan Reynolds
Outline: A look at Wolverine's early life, in particular his time with the government squad Team X and the impact it will have on his later years.

Name: Conspiracy Theory
Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Julia Roberts, Patrick Stewart
Outline: A man obsessed with conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of his theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, in order to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.

Name: Safe Haven
Credit: Dir: Lasse HallstrÃ¶m With: Julianne Hough, Josh Duhamel, Cobie Smulders
Outline: A young woman with a mysterious past lands in Southport, North Carolina where her bond with a widower forces her to confront the dark secret that haunts her.

Name: Lethal Weapon 3
Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci
Outline: Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh pursue an arms dealer who is a former LAPD officer.

Name: The Fast and the Furious
Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez
Outline: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Connor must decide where his loyalties really lie when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.

Name: Brooklyn's Finest
Credit: Dir: Antoine Fuqua With: Richard Gere, Don Cheadle, Ethan Hawke
Outline: Three unconnected Brooklyn cops wind up at the same deadly location after enduring vastly different career paths.

Name: Absolute Power
Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman, Ed Harris
Outline: A career thief witnesses a horrific crime involving the U.S. President.

Name: The Ninth Gate
Credit: Dir: Roman Polanski With: Johnny Depp, Frank Langella, Lena Olin
Outline: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.

Name: Smokin' Aces
Credit: Dir: Joe Carnahan With: Jeremy Piven, Ryan Reynolds, Ray Liotta
Outline: When a Las Vegas performer-turned-snitch named Buddy Israel decides to turn state's evidence and testify against the mob, it seems that a whole lot of people would like to make sure he's no longer breathing.

Name: The Bourne Legacy
Credit: Dir: Tony Gilroy With: Jeremy Renner, Rachel Weisz, Edward Norton
Outline: An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films.

Name: The Chronicles of Riddick
Credit: Dir: David Twohy With: Vin Diesel, Judi Dench, Colm Feore
Outline: The wanted criminal Riddick arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.

Name: Commando
Credit: Dir: Mark L. Lester With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Rae Dawn Chong, Dan Hedaya
Outline: A retired elite Black Ops Commando launches a one man war against a group of South American criminals who have kidnapped his daughter to blackmail him into starting a revolution and getting an exiled dictator back into power.

Name: Diamonds Are Forever
Credit: Dir: Guy Hamilton With: Sean Connery, Jill St. John, Charles Gray
Outline: A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas, where he uncovers an evil plot involving a rich business tycoon.

Name: The Loved Ones
Credit: Dir: Sean Byrne With: Xavier Samuel, Robin McLeavy, Victoria Thaine
Outline: When Brent turns down his classmate Lola's invitation to the prom, she concocts a wildly violent plan for revenge.

Name: In Time
Credit: Dir: Andrew Niccol With: Justin Timberlake, Amanda Seyfried, Cillian Murphy
Outline: In a future where people stop aging at 25, but are engineered to live only one more year, having the means to buy your way out of the situation is a shot at immortal youth. Here, Will Salas finds himself accused of murder and on the run with a hostage - a connection that becomes an important part of the way against the system.

Name: Unfaithful
Credit: Dir: Adrian Lyne With: Richard Gere, Diane Lane, Olivier Martinez
Outline: A New York suburban couple's marriage goes dangerously awry when the wife indulges in an adulterous fling.

Name: Machete
Credit: Dir: Ethan Maniquis, Robert Rodriguez With: Danny Trejo, Michelle Rodriguez, Robert De Niro
Outline: After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.

Name: Pride and Glory
Credit: Dir: Gavin O'Connor With: Edward Norton, Colin Farrell, Noah Emmerich
Outline: A family's moral codes are tested when Ray Tierney investigates a case that reveals an incendiary police corruption scandal involving his own brother-in-law. For Ray, the truth is revelatory, a Pandora's Box that threatens to upend not only the Tierney legacy but the entire NYPD.

Name: The Expendables 2
Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Sylvester Stallone, Liam Hemsworth, Randy Couture
Outline: Mr. Church reunites the Expendables for what should be an easy paycheck, but when one of their men is murdered on the job, their quest for revenge puts them deep in enemy territory and up against an unexpected threat.

Name: Blade II
Credit: Dir: Guillermo del Toro With: Wesley Snipes, Kris Kristofferson, Ron Perlman
Outline: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reaper vampires who feed on vampires.

Name: RED 2
Credit: Dir: Dean Parisot With: Bruce Willis, Helen Mirren, John Malkovich
Outline: Retired C.I.A. agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.

Name: The Bone Collector
Credit: Dir: Phillip Noyce With: Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Queen Latifah
Outline: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his female partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

Name: K-19: The Widowmaker
Credit: Dir: Kathryn Bigelow With: Harrison Ford, Sam Spruell, Peter Stebbings
Outline: When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.

Name: Contagion
Credit: Dir: Steven Soderbergh With: Matt Damon, Kate Winslet, Jude Law
Outline: Healthcare professionals, government officials and everyday people find themselves in the midst of a worldwide epidemic as the CDC works to find a cure.

Name: Fast & Furious
Credit: Dir: Justin Lin With: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez
Outline: Brian O'Conner, now working for the FBI in LA, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.

Name: Elysium
Credit: Dir: Neill Blomkamp With: Matt Damon, Jodie Foster, Sharlto Copley
Outline: In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth. A man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.

Name: Blindness
Credit: Dir: Fernando Meirelles With: Julianne Moore, Mark Ruffalo, Gael GarcÃ­a Bernal
Outline: A city is ravaged by an epidemic of instant "white blindness". Those first afflicted are quarantined...

Name: The Running Man
Credit: Dir: Paul Michael Glaser With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Maria Conchita Alonso, Yaphet Kotto
Outline: A wrongly convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a game show.

Name: Arbitrage
Credit: Dir: Nicholas Jarecki With: Richard Gere, Susan Sarandon, Brit Marling
Outline: A troubled hedge fund magnate desperate to complete the sale of his trading empire makes an error that forces him to turn to an unlikely person for help.

Name: Black Rain
Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Michael Douglas, Andy Garcia, Ken Takakura
Outline: Two NYC cops arrest a Yakuza member and must escort him when he's extradited to Japan.

Name: Summer of Sam
Credit: Dir: Spike Lee With: John Leguizamo, Adrien Brody, Mira Sorvino
Outline: Spike Lee's take on the "Son of Sam" murders in New York City during the summer of 1977 centering on the residents of an Italian-American Northeast Bronx neighborhood who live in fear and distrust of one another.

Name: Wasabi
Credit: Dir: GÃ©rard Krawczyk With: Jean Reno, RyÃ´ko Hirosue, Michel Muller
Outline: Hubert is a French policeman with very sharp methods. After being forced to take 2 months off by his boss...

Name: Sudden Impact
Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Clint Eastwood, Sondra Locke, Pat Hingle
Outline: A rape victim is exacting revenge on her aggressors in a small town outside San Francisco. "Dirty" Harry Callahan, on suspension for angering his superiors (again), is assigned to the case.

Name: Attack the Block
Credit: Dir: Joe Cornish With: John Boyega, Jodie Whittaker, Alex Esmail
Outline: A teen gang in South London defend their block from an alien invasion.

Name: Ransom
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Mel Gibson, Gary Sinise, Rene Russo
Outline: When a rich man's son is kidnapped, he cooperates with the police at first but then tries a unique tactic against the criminals.

Name: Man on a Ledge
Credit: Dir: Asger Leth With: Sam Worthington, Elizabeth Banks, Jamie Bell
Outline: As a police psychologist works to talk down an ex-con who is threatening to jump from a Manhattan hotel rooftop, the biggest diamond heist ever committed is in motion.

Name: Tears of the Sun
Credit: Dir: Antoine Fuqua With: Bruce Willis, Cole Hauser, Monica Bellucci
Outline: A Special-Ops commander leads his team into the Nigerian jungle in order to rescue a doctor who will only join them if they agree to save 70 refugees too.

Name: Vantage Point
Credit: Dir: Pete Travis With: Dennis Quaid, Forest Whitaker, Matthew Fox
Outline: The attempted assassination of the American President is told and re-told from several different perspectives.

Name: The Recruit
Credit: Dir: Roger Donaldson With: Al Pacino, Colin Farrell, Bridget Moynahan
Outline: A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency.

Name: Lethal Weapon 4
Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci
Outline: With personal crises and age weighing in on them, LAPD officers Riggs and Murtaugh must contend with a deadly Chinese crimelord trying to get his brother out of prison.

Name: The Manchurian Candidate
Credit: Dir: Jonathan Demme With: Denzel Washington, Liev Schreiber, Meryl Streep
Outline: In the midst of the Gulf War, soldiers are kidnapped and brainwashed for sinister purposes.

Name: Armageddon
Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton, Ben Affleck
Outline: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

Name: Eagle Eye
Credit: Dir: D.J. Caruso With: Shia LaBeouf, Michelle Monaghan, Rosario Dawson
Outline: Jerry and Rachel are two strangers thrown together by a mysterious phone call from a woman they have never met. Threatening their lives and family, she pushes Jerry and Rachel into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, using the technology of everyday life to track and control their every move.

Name: Crimson Peak
Genre: Drama | Fantasy | Horror | Mystery | Romance | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Guillermo del Toro With: Mia Wasikowska, Jessica Chastain, Tom Hiddleston
Outline: In the aftermath of a family tragedy, an aspiring author is torn between love for her childhood friend and the temptation of a mysterious outsider. Trying to escape the ghosts of her past, she is swept away to a house that breathes, bleeds - and remembers.

Name: 16 Blocks
Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Bruce Willis, Yasiin Bey, David Morse
Outline: An aging alcoholic cop is assigned the task of escorting a witness from police custody to a courthouse 16 blocks away. There are, however, chaotic forces at work that prevent them from making it in one piece.

Name: Edge of Darkness
Credit: Dir: Martin Campbell With: Mel Gibson, Ray Winstone, Danny Huston
Outline: As homicide detective Thomas Craven investigates the death of his activist daughter, he uncovers not only her secret life, but a corporate cover-up and government collusion that attracts an agent tasked with cleaning up the evidence.

Name: Kiss of the Dragon
Credit: Dir: Chris Nahon With: Jet Li, Bridget Fonda, TchÃ©ky Karyo
Outline: A betrayed intelligence officer enlists the aid of a prostitute to prove his innocence from a deadly conspiracy while returning a favor to her.

Name: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil
Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: John Cusack, Kevin Spacey, Jack Thompson
Outline: A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local millionaire, whom he befriends.

Name: The Beach
Credit: Dir: Danny Boyle With: Leonardo DiCaprio, Daniel York, Patcharawan Patarakijjanon
Outline: Twenty-something Richard travels to Thailand and finds himself in possession of a strange map. Rumours state that it leads to a solitary beach paradise, a tropical bliss - excited and intrigued, he sets out to find it.

Name: Courage Under Fire
Credit: Dir: Edward Zwick With: Denzel Washington, Meg Ryan, Lou Diamond Phillips
Outline: A US Army officer, despondent about a deadly mistake he made, investigates a female chopper commander's worthiness for the Medal of Honor.

Name: Christine
Credit: Dir: John Carpenter With: Keith Gordon, John Stockwell, Alexandra Paul
Outline: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

Name: Spartan
Credit: Dir: David Mamet With: Val Kilmer, Derek Luke, William H. Macy
Outline: The investigation into a kidnapping of the daughter of a high-ranking US government official.

Name: Demolition Man
Credit: Dir: Marco Brambilla With: Sylvester Stallone, Wesley Snipes, Sandra Bullock
Outline: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

Name: Om Shanti Om
Genre: Action | Comedy | Drama | Musical | Romance | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Farah Khan With: Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone, Arjun Rampal
Outline: In the 1970s, Om, an aspiring actor, is murdered, but is immediately reincarnated into the present day. He attempts to discover the mystery of his demise and find Shanti, the love of his previous life.

Name: Licence to Kill
Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Timothy Dalton, Robert Davi, Carey Lowell
Outline: James Bond goes rogue and sets off to unleash vengeance on a drug lord who tortured his best friend, a C.I.A. agent, and left him for dead and murdered his bride after he helped capture him.

Name: Underworld: Rise of the Lycans
Credit: Dir: Patrick Tatopoulos With: Rhona Mitra, Michael Sheen, Bill Nighy
Outline: An origins story centered on the centuries-old feud between the race of aristocratic vampires and their onetime slaves, the Lycans.

Name: Drag Me to Hell
Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: Alison Lohman, Justin Long, Ruth Livier
Outline: A loan officer who evicts an old woman from her home finds herself the recipient of a supernatural curse. Desperate, she turns to a seer to try and save her soul, while evil forces work to push her to a breaking point.

Name: Derailed
Credit: Dir: Mikael HÃ¥fstrÃ¶m With: Clive Owen, Jennifer Aniston, Vincent Cassel
Outline: When two married business executives having an affair are blackmailed by a violent criminal, the two must turn the tables on him to save their families.

Name: Insidious: Chapter 2
Credit: Dir: James Wan With: Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne, Barbara Hershey
Outline: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that have haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

Name: The Last House on the Left
Credit: Dir: Dennis Iliadis With: Garret Dillahunt, Monica Potter, Tony Goldwyn
Outline: After kidnapping and brutally assaulting two young women, a gang unknowingly finds refuge at a vacation home belonging to the parents of one of the victims: a mother and father who devise an increasingly gruesome series of revenge tactics.

Name: Rush Hour 2
Credit: Dir: Brett Ratner With: Jackie Chan, Chris Tucker, John Lone
Outline: Carter and Lee head to Hong Kong for vacation, but become embroiled in a counterfeit money scam.

Name: Star Trek: Generations
Credit: Dir: David Carson With: Patrick Stewart, William Shatner, Malcolm McDowell
Outline: Captain Picard, with the help of supposedly dead Captain Kirk, must stop a madman willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.

Name: Terminator Genisys
Credit: Dir: Alan Taylor With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jason Clarke, Emilia Clarke
Outline: When John Connor, leader of the human resistance, sends Sgt. Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect Sarah Connor and safeguard the future, an unexpected turn of events creates a fractured timeline.

Name: Joy Ride
Credit: Dir: John Dahl With: Matthew Kimbrough, Leelee Sobieski, Steve Zahn
Outline: Three young people on a road trip from Colorado to New Jersey talk to a trucker on their CB radio, then must escape when he turns out to be a psychotic killer.

Name: Hostage
Credit: Dir: Florent-Emilio Siri With: Bruce Willis, Kevin Pollak, Serena Scott Thomas
Outline: A failed police negotiator turned small town cop, must save the lives of a family held hostage, which draws him into a much more dangerous situation.

Name: What Lies Beneath
Credit: Dir: Robert Zemeckis With: Harrison Ford, Michelle Pfeiffer, Katharine Towne
Outline: The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she is losing her mind.

Name: Octopussy
Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Roger Moore, Maud Adams, Louis Jourdan
Outline: A fake FabergÃ© egg and a fellow agent's death lead James Bond to uncover an international jewel-smuggling operation, headed by the mysterious Octopussy, being used to disguise a nuclear attack on N.A.T.O. forces.

Name: Secret Window
Credit: Dir: David Koepp With: Johnny Depp, Maria Bello, John Turturro
Outline: A writer is accused for plagiarism by a strange man, who then starts haunting him for "justice."

Name: Run All Night
Credit: Dir: Jaume Collet-Serra With: Liam Neeson, Ed Harris, Joel Kinnaman
Outline: Mobster and hit man Jimmy Conlon has one night to figure out where his loyalties lie: with his estranged son, Mike, whose life is in danger, or his longtime best friend, mob boss Shawn Maguire, who wants Mike to pay for the death of his own son.

Name: The Mechanic
Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Jason Statham, Ben Foster, Donald Sutherland
Outline: Follows an elite hit man as he teaches his trade to an apprentice who has a connection to one of his previous victims.

Name: Kiss the Girls
Credit: Dir: Gary Fleder With: Morgan Freeman, Ashley Judd, Cary Elwes
Outline: Police hunting for a serial killer are helped when a victim manages to escape for the first time.

Name: Copycat
Credit: Dir: Jon Amiel With: Sigourney Weaver, Holly Hunter, Dermot Mulroney
Outline: An agoraphobic psychologist and a female detective must work together to take down a serial killer who copies serial killers from the past.

Name: Bad Boys II
Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Gabrielle Union
Outline: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida.

Name: Severance
Credit: Dir: Christopher Smith With: Danny Dyer, Laura Harris, Tim McInnerny
Outline: During a team-building retreat in the mountains a group of sales representatives are hunted down one by one.

Name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors
Credit: Dir: Chuck Russell With: Heather Langenkamp, Robert Englund, Craig Wasson
Outline: Survivors of undead serial killer Freddy Krueger - who stalks his victims in their dreams - learn to take control of their own dreams in order to fight back.

Name: Outbreak
Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Petersen With: Dustin Hoffman, Rene Russo, Morgan Freeman
Outline: Extreme measures are necessary to contain an epidemic of a deadly airborne virus. But how extreme, exactly?

Name: Idiocracy
Credit: Dir: Mike Judge With: Luke Wilson, Maya Rudolph, Dax Shepard
Outline: Private Joe Bauers, the definition of "average American", is selected by the Pentagon to be the guinea pig for a top-secret hibernation program. Forgotten, he awakes five centuries in the future. He discovers a society so incredibly dumbed down that he's easily the most intelligent person alive.

Name: The Da Vinci Code
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Tom Hanks, Audrey Tautou, Jean Reno
Outline: A murder inside the Louvre and clues in Da Vinci paintings lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years -- which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

Name: Awake
Credit: Dir: Joby Harold With: Hayden Christensen, Jessica Alba, Terrence Howard
Outline: The story focuses on a man who suffers "anesthetic awareness" and finds himself awake and aware, but paralyzed, during heart surgery. His mother must wrestle with her own demons as a turn of events unfolds around them, while trying to unfold the story hidden behind her son's young wife.

Name: Flatliners
Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Kiefer Sutherland, Kevin Bacon, Julia Roberts
Outline: Four Medical students experiment on "near death" experiences that involve past tragedies until the dark consequences begin to jeopardize their lives.

Name: Day Watch
Credit: Dir: Timur Bekmambetov With: Konstantin Khabenskiy, Mariya Poroshina, Vladimir Menshov
Outline: A man who serves in the war between the forces of Light and Dark comes into possession of a device that can restore life to Moscow, which was nearly destroyed by an apocalyptic event.

Name: Heist
Credit: Dir: David Mamet With: Gene Hackman, Rebecca Pidgeon, Danny DeVito
Outline: A career jewel thief finds himself at tense odds with his longtime partner, a crime boss who sends his nephew to keep watch.

Name: Hollywoodland
Genre: Biography | Crime | Drama | History | Mystery | Romance | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Allen Coulter With: Adrien Brody, Ben Affleck, Diane Lane
Outline: A detective examines the mysterious death of George Reeves , the star of the television series Adventures of Superman .

Name: Byzantium
Credit: Dir: Neil Jordan With: Saoirse Ronan, Gemma Arterton, Sam Riley
Outline: Residents of a coastal town learn, with deathly consequences, the secret shared by the two mysterious women who have sought shelter at a local resort.

Name: District 13: Ultimatum
Credit: Dir: Patrick Alessandrin With: Cyril Raffaelli, David Belle, Philippe Torreton
Outline: Damien and Leito return to District 13 on a mission to bring peace to the troubled sector that is controlled by five different gang bosses, before the city's secret services take drastic measures to solve the problem.

Name: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
Credit: Dir: Frank Miller, Robert Rodriguez With: Mickey Rourke, Jessica Alba, Josh Brolin
Outline: Some of Sin City's most hard-boiled citizens cross paths with a few of its more reviled inhabitants.

Name: Need for Speed
Credit: Dir: Scott Waugh With: Aaron Paul, Dominic Cooper, Imogen Poots
Outline: Fresh from prison, a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate joins a cross country race with revenge in mind. His ex-partner, learning of the plan, places a massive bounty on his head as the race begins.

Name: The Hand That Rocks the Cradle
Credit: Dir: Curtis Hanson With: Annabella Sciorra, Rebecca De Mornay, Matt McCoy
Outline: After her humiliated husband kills himself, an embittered pregnant widow loses her child, and embarks on a mission of vengeance against a woman and her family.

Name: The Pelican Brief
Credit: Dir: Alan J. Pakula With: Julia Roberts, Denzel Washington, Sam Shepard
Outline: A law student uncovers a conspiracy, putting herself and others in danger.

Name: Stand Up Guys
Credit: Dir: Fisher Stevens With: Al Pacino, Christopher Walken, Alan Arkin
Outline: A pair of aging stickup men try to get the old gang back together for one last hurrah before one of the guys takes his last assignment - to kill his comrade.

Name: Safe
Credit: Dir: Boaz Yakin With: Jason Statham, Catherine Chan, Chris Sarandon
Outline: Mei, a young girl whose memory holds a priceless numerical code, finds herself pursued by the Triads, the Russian mob, and corrupt NYC cops. Coming to her aid is an ex-cage fighter whose life was destroyed by the gangsters on Mei's trail.

Name: A Walk Among the Tombstones
Credit: Dir: Scott Frank With: Liam Neeson, Dan Stevens, David Harbour
Outline: Private investigator Matthew Scudder is hired by a drug kingpin to find out who kidnapped and murdered his wife.

Name: A Perfect Getaway
Credit: Dir: David Twohy With: Milla Jovovich, Steve Zahn, Timothy Olyphant
Outline: Two pairs of lovers on a Hawaiian vacation discover that psychopaths are stalking and murdering tourists on the islands.

Name: Homefront
Credit: Dir: Gary Fleder With: Jason Statham, James Franco, Winona Ryder
Outline: A former DEA agent moves his family to a quiet town, where he soon tangles with a local meth druglord.

Name: Premium Rush
Credit: Dir: David Koepp With: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Michael Shannon, Dania Ramirez
Outline: In Manhattan, a bike messenger picks up an envelope that attracts the interest of a dirty cop, who pursues the cyclist throughout the city.

Name: Savages
Credit: Dir: Oliver Stone With: Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Taylor Kitsch, Blake Lively
Outline: Pot growers Ben and Chon face off against the Mexican drug cartel who kidnapped their shared girlfriend.

Name: The Double
Credit: Dir: Richard Ayoade With: Jesse Eisenberg, Mia Wasikowska, Wallace Shawn
Outline: A clerk in a government agency finds his unenviable life takes a turn for the horrific with the arrival of a new co-worker who is both his exact physical double and his opposite - confident, charismatic and seductive with women.

Name: Instinct
Credit: Dir: Jon Turteltaub With: Anthony Hopkins, Cuba Gooding Jr., Donald Sutherland
Outline: When a noted anthropologist who left society to live in the jungle is imprisoned for murder, it's up to a young psychiatrist to get through to him.

Name: You're Next
Credit: Dir: Adam Wingard With: Sharni Vinson, Joe Swanberg, AJ Bowen
Outline: When the Davison family comes under attack during their wedding anniversary getaway, the gang of mysterious killers soon learns that one of the victims harbors a secret talent for fighting back.

Name: Swordfish
Credit: Dir: Dominic Sena With: John Travolta, Hugh Jackman, Halle Berry
Outline: A covert counter-terrorist unit called Black Cell led by Gabriel Shear wants the money to help finance their war against international terrorism, but it's all locked away. Gabriel brings in convicted hacker Stanley Jobson to help him.

Name: Wild Things
Credit: Dir: John McNaughton With: Kevin Bacon, Matt Dillon, Neve Campbell
Outline: A police detective uncovers a conspiracy behind a case involving a high-school guidance counselor when accusations of rape are made against him by two female students.

Name: Unknown
Credit: Dir: Simon Brand With: Jim Caviezel, Greg Kinnear, Bridget Moynahan
Outline: Five men wake up in a locked-down warehouse with no memory of who they are. They are forced to figure out who is good and who is bad to stay alive.

Name: Friday the 13th
Credit: Dir: Sean S. Cunningham With: Betsy Palmer, Adrienne King, Jeannine Taylor

Credit: Dir: Mimi Leder With: George Clooney, Nicole Kidman, Marcel Iures

Name: Gone

Name: 88 Minutes

Name: The X Files: I Want to Believe
Credit: Dir: Chris Carter With: David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson, Billy Connolly

Name: Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter
Credit: Dir: Joseph Zito With: Erich Anderson, Judie Aronson, Peter Barton
Outline: After being mortally wounded and taken to the morgue, murderer Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives and embarks on a killing spree as he makes his way back to his home at Camp Crystal Lake.

Name: The One
Credit: Dir: James Wong With: Jet Li, Carla Gugino, Delroy Lindo
Outline: A sheriff's deputy fights an alternate universe version of himself who grows stronger with each alternate self he kills.

Name: The Haunting in Connecticut
Credit: Dir: Peter Cornwell With: Virginia Madsen, Martin Donovan, Elias Koteas
Outline: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, and uncover a sinister history.

Name: The Possession

Name: The Host

Outline: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie will risk everything to protect the people she cares most about, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.

Name: Hide and Seek

Outline: As a widower tries to piece together his life in the wake of his wife's suicide, his daughter finds solace -- at first -- in her imaginary friend.

Name: Shaft

Outline: New York City police detective John Shaft (nephew of the original 1970s detective) goes on a personal mission to make sure the son of a real estate tycoon is brought to justice after a racially-motivated murder.

Name: The 6th Day

Outline: Futuristic action about a man who meets a clone of himself and stumbles into a grand conspiracy about clones taking over the world.

Name: Sanctum
Credit: Dir: Alister Grierson With: Rhys Wakefield, Allison Cratchley, Christopher James Baker

Name: Jurassic Park III

Name: Premonition

Name: Blade: Trinity

Name: Vertical Limit

Name: Battleship

Name: The Grudge

Name: The Green Hornet

Name: Passengers

Name: 2 Fast 2 Furious

Name: The Net

Outline: A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.

Name: Into the Blue

Name: Into the Storm

Name: Straw Dogs

Name: Dante's Peak
Credit: Dir: Roger Donaldson With: Pierce Brosnan, Linda Hamilton, Jamie RenÃ©e Smith
Outline: A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside town named Dante's Peak after a long dormant volcano, which has recently been named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment.

Name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars

Credit: Dir: Dave Filoni With: Matt Lanter, Nika Futterman, Tom Kane

Name: Passenger 57

Outline: An airline security expert must take action when he finds himself trapped on a passenger jet when terrorists seize control of it.

Name: The Descent: Part 2

Name: Daylight

Outline: An officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who has a tie to his past.

Name: G.I. Joe: Retaliation

Name: The Fan

Name: Gothika

Name: Firewall

Outline: A security specialist is forced into robbing the bank that he's protecting, as a bid to pay off his family's ransom.

Name: The Gunman
Credit: Dir: Pierre Morel With: Sean Penn, Idris Elba, Jasmine Trinca
Outline: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself.

Name: The Forgotten

Name: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra

Name: Another 48 Hrs.

Name: Hard Rain
Credit: Dir: Mikael Salomon With: Morgan Freeman, Christian Slater, Randy Quaid
Outline: In Huntingburg, the armored truck with three million dollars driven by Tom and his Uncle Charlie gets...

Name: Mortal Kombat
Credit: Dir: Paul W.S. Anderson With: Christopher Lambert, Robin Shou, Linden Ashby
Outline: Three unknowing martial artists are summoned to a mysterious island to compete in a tournament whose outcome will decide the fate of the world.

Name: Oldboy

Name: The Paperboy

Outline: A reporter returns to his Florida home-town to investigate a case involving a death row inmate.

Name: Hitman: Agent 47

Outline: An assassin teams up with a woman to help her find her father and uncover the mysteries of her ancestry.

Name: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider

Outline: Video game adventuress Lara Croft comes to life in a movie where she races against time and villains to recover powerful ancient artifacts.

Name: Priest

Name: Sabotage

Name: Race to Witch Mountain

Name: RoboCop 2

Name: Cube Zero

Name: Reindeer Games

Name: Open Water

Outline: When two divers find themselves stranded in the ocean, getting rescued becomes the least of their worries when a frenzy of hungry sharks close in on them.

Name: Rambo III

Name: Unfriended

Name: Jaws 2

Name: The Art of War

Name: Armored

Name: Brick Mansions

Name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master

Name: Lady in the Water

When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world.

Name: Fool's Gold
Credit: Dir: Andy Tennant With: Matthew McConaughey, Kate Hudson, Donald Sutherland

Name: Cube²: Hypercube

Name: Machete Kills

Name: Cobra

Name: The Last Exorcism

Name: The Purge

Name: Runner Runner

Name: Enough

Name: Wild Card
Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Jason Statham, Michael Angarano, Dominik GarcÃ­a-Lorido

Name: Bad Company

Name: House at the End of the Street

Name: AVP: Alien vs. Predator
Credit: Dir: Paul W.S. Anderson With: Sanaa Lathan, Lance Henriksen, Raoul Bova
Outline: During an archaeological expedition on BouvetÃ¸ya Island in Antarctica, a team of archaeologists and other scientists find themselves caught up in a battle between the two legends. Soon, the team realize that only one species can win.

Name: Snakes on a Plane

Name: The Skulls

Name: House on Haunted Hill

Outline: A millionaire offers a group of diverse people $1,000,000 to spend the night in a haunted house with a horrifying past.

Name: The Black Dahlia

Outline: Two policemen see their personal and professional lives fall apart in the wake of the "Black Dahlia" murder investigation.

Name: Babylon A.D.

Name: Money Train

Name: National Security

Name: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark

Outline: A young girl sent to live with her father and his new girlfriend believes that she has released creatures from a sealed ash pit in the basement of her new home.

Name: Chain Reaction

Name: Mission to Mars

Name: The Scorpion King

Name: Exit Wounds

Outline: Orin Boyd, a tough cop in an inner-city precinct discovers a web of dirty cops and corruption.

Name: Stolen

Outline: A former thief frantically searches for his missing daughter, who has been kidnapped and locked in the trunk of a taxi.

Name: Charlie's Angels
Credit: Dir: McG With: Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu
Outline: Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.

Name: The Last Days on Mars
Credit: Dir: Ruairi Robinson With: Liev Schreiber, Elias Koteas, Romola Garai
Outline: A group of astronaut explorers succumb one by one to a mysterious and terrifying force while collecting specimens on Mars.

Name: Dreamcatcher
Credit: Dir: Lawrence Kasdan With: Morgan Freeman, Thomas Jane, Jason Lee
Outline: Friends on a camping trip discover that the town they're vacationing in is being plagued in an unusual fashion by parasitic aliens from outer space.

Name: Whiteout
Credit: Dir: Dominic Sena With: Kate Beckinsale, Gabriel Macht, Tom Skerritt
Outline: U.S. Marshal Carrie Stetko tracks a killer in Antarctica, as the sun is about to set for six months.

Name: Southland Tales
Credit: Dir: Richard Kelly With: Dwayne Johnson, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Seann William Scott
Outline: During a three day heat wave just before a huge 4th of July celebration, an action star stricken with amnesia meets up with a porn star who is developing her own reality TV project, and a policeman who holds the key to a vast conspiracy.

Name: Beverly Hills Cop III
Credit: Dir: John Landis With: Eddie Murphy, Jon Tenney, Joey Travolta
Outline: Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who shot his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.

Name: White Noise
Credit: Dir: Geoffrey Sax With: Michael Keaton, Deborah Kara Unger, Ian McNeice
Outline: An architect's desire to speak with his wife from beyond the grave, becomes an obsession with supernatural repercussions.

Name: The Day the Earth Stood Still
Credit: Dir: Scott Derrickson With: Keanu Reeves, Jennifer Connelly, Kathy Bates
Outline: A remake of the 1951 classic sci-fi film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

Name: Urban Legend
Credit: Dir: Jamie Blanks With: Jared Leto, Alicia Witt, Rebecca Gayheart
Outline: A college student suspects a series of bizarre deaths are connected to certain urban legends.

Name: Dhoom:3
Credit: Dir: Vijay Krishna Acharya With: Aamir Khan, Katrina Kaif, Abhishek Bachchan
Outline: To avenge his father's death, a circus entertainer trained in magic and acrobatics turns thief to take down a corrupt bank in Chicago. Two cops from Mumbai are assigned to the case.

Name: My Bloody Valentine
Credit: Dir: Patrick Lussier With: Jensen Ackles, Jaime King, Kerr Smith
Outline: Tom returns to his hometown on the tenth anniversary of the Valentine's night massacre that claimed the lives of 22 people. Instead of a homecoming, Tom finds himself suspected of committing the murders, and it seems like his old flame is the only one that believes he's innocent.

Name: Collateral Damage
Credit: Dir: Andrew Davis With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, John Leguizamo, Francesca Neri
Outline: After his family is killed by a terrorist act, a firefighter goes in search of the one responsible.

Name: The Whole Ten Yards
Credit: Dir: Howard Deutch With: Bruce Willis, Matthew Perry, Natasha Henstridge
Outline: Jimmy the Tulip's (Willis) quiet new life is shaken up by his old pal Oz (Perry), whose wife (Henstridge) has been kidnapped by a Hungarian mob. The Tulip and his wife Jill (Peet) spring into action.

Name: Drive Angry
Credit: Dir: Patrick Lussier With: Nicolas Cage, Amber Heard, William Fichtner
Outline: A vengeful father escapes from hell and chases after the men who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter.

Name: Teeth
Credit: Dir: Mitchell Lichtenstein With: Jess Weixler, John Hensley, Josh Pais
Outline: Still a stranger to her own body, a high school student discovers she has a physical advantage when she becomes the object of male violence.

Name: Judge Dredd
Credit: Dir: Danny Cannon With: Sylvester Stallone, Armand Assante, Rob Schneider
Outline: In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers), is convicted for a crime he did not commit and must face his murderous counterpart.

Name: The Specialist
Credit: Dir: Luis Llosa With: Sylvester Stallone, Sharon Stone, James Woods
Outline: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

Name: The Core
Credit: Dir: Jon Amiel With: Aaron Eckhart, Hilary Swank, Delroy Lindo
Outline: The only way to save Earth from catastrophe is to drill down to the core and set it spinning again.

Name: Red Dawn
Credit: Dir: Dan Bradley With: Chris Hemsworth, Isabel Lucas, Josh Hutcherson
Outline: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.

Name: Red Riding Hood
Credit: Dir: Catherine Hardwicke With: Amanda Seyfried, Lukas Haas, Gary Oldman
Outline: Set in a medieval village that is haunted by a werewolf, a young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.

Name: I Spy
Credit: Dir: Betty Thomas With: Eddie Murphy, Owen Wilson, Famke Janssen
Outline: A professional athlete has to help a U.S. government agent recover a missing jet.

Name: Killing Season
Credit: Dir: Mark Steven Johnson With: Robert De Niro, John Travolta, Milo Ventimiglia
Outline: Two veterans of the Bosnian War - one American, one Serbian - find their unlikely friendship tested when one of them reveals their true intentions.

Name: Killers
Credit: Dir: Robert Luketic With: Katherine Heigl, Ashton Kutcher, Tom Selleck
Outline: A vacationing woman meets her ideal man, leading to a swift marriage. Back at home, however, their idyllic life is upset when they discover their neighbors could be assassins who have been contracted to kill the couple.

Name: Volcano
Credit: Dir: Mick Jackson With: Tommy Lee Jones, Anne Heche, Gaby Hoffmann
Outline: A volcano erupts in downtown L.A., threatening to destroy the city.

Name: Stone
Credit: Dir: John Curran With: Edward Norton, Milla Jovovich, Robert De Niro
Outline: A convicted arsonist looks to manipulate a parole officer into a plan to secure his parole by placing his beautiful wife in the lawman's path.

Name: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
Credit: Dir: William Shatner With: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley
Outline: Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Mr. Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy.

Name: Under Siege 2: Dark Territory
Credit: Dir: Geoff Murphy With: Steven Seagal, Eric Bogosian, Everett McGill
Outline: Casey Ryback hops on a Colorado to LA train to start a vacation with his niece. Early into the trip, terrorists board the train and use it as a mobile HQ to hijack a top secret destructive US satellite.

Name: Pathfinder
Credit: Dir: Marcus Nispel With: Karl Urban, Clancy Brown, Moon Bloodgood
Outline: A Viking boy is left behind after his clan battles a Native American tribe. Raised within the tribe, he ultimately becomes their savior in a fight against the Norsemen.

Name: The Messengers
Credit: Dir: Danny Pang, Oxide Chun Pang With: Dylan McDermott, Penelope Ann Miller, Kristen Stewart
Outline: An ominous darkness invades a seemingly serene sunflower farm in North Dakota, and the Solomon family is torn apart by suspicion, mayhem and murder.

Name: Bangkok Dangerous
Credit: Dir: Danny Pang, Oxide Chun Pang With: Nicolas Cage, Charlie Yeung, Shahkrit Yamnarm
Outline: A hitman who's in Bangkok to pull off a series of jobs violates his personal code when he falls for a local woman and bonds with his errand boy.

Name: Blackhat
Credit: Dir: Michael Mann With: Chris Hemsworth, Viola Davis, Wei Tang
Outline: A furloughed convict and his American and Chinese partners hunt a high-level cybercrime network from Chicago to Los Angeles to Hong Kong to Jakarta.

Name: Max Payne
Credit: Dir: John Moore With: Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis, Beau Bridges
Outline: Coming together to solve a series of murders in New York City are a police detective whose family was slain as part of a conspiracy and an assassin out to avenge her sister's death. The duo will be hunted by the police, the mob, and a ruthless corporation.

Name: Resident Evil: Retribution
Credit: Dir: Paul W.S. Anderson With: Milla Jovovich, Sienna Guillory, Michelle Rodriguez
Outline: Alice fights alongside a resistance movement to regain her freedom from an Umbrella Corporation testing facility.

Name: The Eye
Credit: Dir: David Moreau, Xavier Palud With: Jessica Alba, Alessandro Nivola, Parker Posey
Outline: A woman receives an eye transplant that allows her to see into the supernatural world.

Name: The Counselor
Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Michael Fassbender, PenÃ©lope Cruz, Cameron Diaz
Outline: A lawyer finds himself in over his head when he gets involved in drug trafficking.

Name: Masters of the Universe
Credit: Dir: Gary Goddard With: Dolph Lundgren, Frank Langella, Meg Foster
Outline: A prince turned warrior named He-Man battles against the dark lord Skeletor on the planet Eternia. He-Man and his comrades arrive on Earth and discover two teenage lovers to find the magical Cosmic Key.

Name: Turistas
Credit: Dir: John Stockwell With: Josh Duhamel, Melissa George, Olivia Wilde
Outline: A group of young backpackers' vacation turns sour when a bus accident leaves them marooned in a remote Brazilian rural area that holds an ominous secret.

Name: Hollywood Homicide
Credit: Dir: Ron Shelton With: Harrison Ford, Josh Hartnett, Isaiah Washington
Outline: Two LAPD detectives who moonlight in other fields investigate the murder of an up-and-coming rap group.

Name: Daredevil
Credit: Dir: Mark Steven Johnson With: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Garner, Colin Farrell
Outline: A man blinded by toxic waste which also enhanced his remaining senses fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero.

Name: A Good Day to Die Hard
Credit: Dir: John Moore With: Bruce Willis, Jai Courtney, Sebastian Koch
Outline: John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working undercover, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces.

Name: The Astronaut's Wife
Credit: Dir: Rand Ravich With: Charlize Theron, Johnny Depp, Joe Morton
Outline: After an explosion in space and subsequent two-minute radio-out period, two astronauts return home to their wives. Slightly it's revealed that they're not the same as they were.

Name: Trespass
Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Nicolas Cage, Nicole Kidman, Cam Gigandet
Outline: As they're held for ransom, a husband and wife's predicament grows more dire amid the discovery of betrayal and deception.

Name: Godzilla
Credit: Dir: Roland Emmerich With: Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo
Outline: There is a gigantic monstrous creature who came from the sea that is set loose in Manhattan. Can anyone defeat this monster and kill its babies.

Name: One for the Money
Credit: Dir: Julie Anne Robinson With: Katherine Heigl, Jason O'Mara, Daniel Sunjata
Outline: Unemployed and newly-divorced Stephanie Plum lands a job at her cousin's bail-bond business, where her first assignment puts her on the trail of a wanted local cop from her romantic past.

Name: The Colony
Credit: Dir: Jeff Renfroe With: Kevin Zegers, Laurence Fishburne, Bill Paxton
Outline: Forced underground by the next ice age, a struggling outpost of survivors must fight to preserve humanity against a threat even more savage than nature.

Name: The Covenant
Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Steven Strait, Sebastian Stan, Toby Hemingway
Outline: Four young men who belong to a supernatural legacy are forced to battle a fifth power long thought to have died out. Another great force they must contend with is the jealousy and suspicion that threatens to tear them apart.

Name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
Credit: Dir: Samuel Bayer With: Jackie Earle Haley, Rooney Mara, Kyle Gallner
Outline: The spectre of a dead child rapist haunts the children of the parents who murdered him, stalking and killing them in their dreams.

Name: A Serbian Film
Credit: Dir: Srdjan Spasojevic With: Srdjan Todorovic, Sergej Trifunovic, Jelena Gavrilovic
Outline: An aging porn star agrees to participate in an "art film" in order to make a clean break from the business, only to discover that he has been drafted into making a pedophilia and necrophilia themed snuff film.

Name: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Brendan Fraser, Jet Li, Maria Bello
Outline: In the Far East, Alex O'Connell, the son of famed mummy fighters Rick and Evy O'Connell, unearths the mummy of the first Emperor of Qin -- a shape-shifting entity cursed by a witch centuries ago.

Name: The 5th Wave
Credit: Dir: J Blakeson With: ChloÃ« Grace Moretz, Matthew Zuk, Gabriela Lopez
Outline: Four waves of increasingly deadly alien attacks have left most of Earth decimated. Cassie is on the run, desperately trying to save her younger brother.

Name: Doom
Credit: Dir: Andrzej Bartkowiak With: Karl Urban, Rosamund Pike, Dwayne Johnson
Outline: Space Marines are sent to investigate strange events at a research facility on Mars but find themselves at the mercy of genetically enhanced killing machines.

Name: Ghost Rider
Credit: Dir: Mark Steven Johnson With: Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes, Sam Elliott
Outline: Stunt motorcyclist Johnny Blaze gives up his soul to become a hellblazing vigilante, to fight against power hungry Blackheart, the son of the devil himself.

Name: The Stepford Wives
Credit: Dir: Frank Oz With: Nicole Kidman, Bette Midler, Matthew Broderick
Outline: What does it take to become a Stepford wife, a woman perfect beyond belief? Ask the Stepford husbands, who've created this high-tech terrifying little town, in a very modern comedy-thriller.

Name: Shutter
Credit: Dir: Masayuki Ochiai With: Joshua Jackson, Rachael Taylor, James Kyson
Outline: A newly married couple discovers disturbing, ghostly images in photographs they develop after a tragic accident. Fearing the manifestations may be connected, they investigate and learn that some mysteries are better left unsolved.

Name: Apollo 18
Credit: Dir: Gonzalo LÃ³pez-Gallego With: Warren Christie, Lloyd Owen, Ryan Robbins
Outline: Decades-old found footage from NASA's abandoned Apollo 18 mission, where two American astronauts were sent on a secret expedition, reveals the reason the U.S. has never returned to the moon.

Name: The Lazarus Effect
Credit: Dir: David Gelb With: Olivia Wilde, Mark Duplass, Evan Peters
Outline: A group of medical researchers discover a way to bring dead patients back to life.

Name: I, Frankenstein
Credit: Dir: Stuart Beattie With: Aaron Eckhart, Bill Nighy, Miranda Otto
Outline: Frankenstein's creature finds himself caught in an all-out, centuries old war between two immortal clans.

Name: Exorcist: The Beginning
Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Stellan SkarsgÃ¥rd, Izabella Scorupco, James D'Arcy
Outline: Years before Father Lancaster Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith.

Name: Alex Cross
Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Tyler Perry, Matthew Fox, Rachel Nichols
Outline: A homicide detective is pushed to the brink of his moral and physical limits as he tangles with a ferociously skilled serial killer who specializes in torture and pain.

Name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 5: The Dream Child
Credit: Dir: Stephen Hopkins With: Robert Englund, Lisa Wilcox, Kelly Jo Minter
Outline: Alice, having survived the previous installment of the Nightmare series, finds the deadly dreams of Freddy Krueger starting once again...

Name: Get Carter
Credit: Dir: Stephen Kay With: Sylvester Stallone, Rachael Leigh Cook, Miranda Richardson
Outline: Years ago, Jack Carter left his Seattle home to become a Las Vegas mob casino financial enforcer. He...

Name: Lost in Space
Credit: Dir: Stephen Hopkins With: Gary Oldman, William Hurt, Matt LeBlanc
Outline: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

Name: The Cave
Credit: Dir: Bruce Hunt With: Piper Perabo, Morris Chestnut, Cole Hauser
Outline: Bloodthirsty creatures await a pack of divers who become trapped in an underwater cave network.

Name: Stay Alive
Credit: Dir: William Brent Bell With: Jon Foster, Samaire Armstrong, Frankie Muniz
Outline: For a group of teens, the answer to the mysterious death of their old friend lies within the world of an online video game based on the true story of an ancient noblewoman known as the Blood Countess.

Name: The Happening
Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Mark Wahlberg, Zooey Deschanel, John Leguizamo
Outline: A science teacher, his wife, and a young girl struggle to survive a plague that causes those infected to commit suicide.

Name: Agent Cody Banks
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Crime | Family | Romance | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Harald Zwart With: Frankie Muniz, Hilary Duff, Andrew Francis
Outline: A government agent trains Cody Banks in the ways of covert operations that require younger participants.

Name: Silent Hill: Revelation 3D
Credit: Dir: Michael J. Bassett With: Adelaide Clemens, Kit Harington, Sean Bean
Outline: When her father disappears, Heather Mason is drawn into a strange and terrifying alternate reality that holds answers to the horrific nightmares that have plagued her since childhood.

Name: Abduction
Credit: Dir: John Singleton With: Taylor Lautner, Lily Collins, Alfred Molina
Outline: A thriller centered on a young man who sets out to uncover the truth about his life after finding his baby photo on a missing persons website.

Name: Stealth
Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel, Jamie Foxx
Outline: Deeply ensconced in a top-secret military program, three pilots struggle to bring an artificial intelligence program under control before it initiates the next world war.

Name: When a Stranger Calls
Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Camilla Belle, Tommy Flanagan, Katie Cassidy
Outline: During a babysitting gig, a high-school student is harassed by an increasingly threatening prank caller.

Name: Chernobyl Diaries
Credit: Dir: Bradley Parker With: Jesse McCartney, Jonathan Sadowski, Olivia Taylor Dudley
Outline: Six tourists hire an extreme tour guide who takes them to the abandoned city Pripyat, the former home to the workers of the Chernobyl nuclear reactor. During their exploration, they soon discover they are not alone.

Name: Paranormal Activity: The Marked Ones
Credit: Dir: Christopher Landon With: Andrew Jacobs, Jorge Diaz, Gabrielle Walsh
Outline: When a young man becomes the target of a malevolent entity, he must uncover its true intentions before it takes complete control of him.

Name: Poltergeist
Credit: Dir: Gil Kenan With: Sam Rockwell, Rosemarie DeWitt, Kennedi Clements
Outline: A family whose suburban home is haunted by evil forces must come together to rescue their youngest daughter after the apparitions take her captive.

Name: The Grudge 2
Credit: Dir: Takashi Shimizu With: Amber Tamblyn, Edison Chen, Arielle Kebbel
Outline: Three interwoven stories about a terrible curse. A young woman encounters a malevolent supernatural force while searching for her missing sister in Tokyo; a mean high school prank goes horribly wrong; a woman with a deadly secret moves into a Chicago apartment building.

Name: Darkness Falls
Credit: Dir: Jonathan Liebesman With: Chaney Kley, Emma Caulfield, Antony Burrows
Outline: A vengeful spirit has taken the form of the Tooth Fairy to exact vengeance on the town that lynched her 150 years earlier. Her only opposition is the only child, now grown up, who has survived her before.

Name: Freddy's Dead: The Final Nightmare
Credit: Dir: Rachel Talalay With: Robert Englund, Lisa Zane, Shon Greenblatt
Outline: Freddy Krueger returns once again to haunt both the dreams of his daughter and Springwood's last surviving teenager.

Name: The Cold Light of Day
Credit: Dir: Mabrouk El Mechri With: Henry Cavill, Bruce Willis, Sigourney Weaver
Outline: After his family is kidnapped during their sailing trip in Spain, a young Wall Street trader is confronted by the people responsible: intelligence agents looking to recover a mysterious briefcase.

Name: Knock Knock
Credit: Dir: Eli Roth With: Keanu Reeves, Lorenza Izzo, Ana de Armas
Outline: When a devoted husband and father is left home alone for the weekend, two stranded young women unexpectedly knock on his door for help. What starts out as a kind gesture results in a dangerous seduction and a deadly game of cat and mouse.

Name: The Darkest Hour
Credit: Dir: Chris Gorak With: Emile Hirsch, Olivia Thirlby, Max Minghella
Outline: In Moscow, five young people lead the charge against an alien race who have attacked Earth via our power supply.

Name: Seed of Chucky
Credit: Dir: Don Mancini With: Jennifer Tilly, Brad Dourif, John Waters
Outline: Chucky and Tiffany are resurrected by their innocent son, Glen, and hit Hollywood, where a movie depicting the killer dolls' murder spree is underway.

Name: The Haunting
Credit: Dir: Jan de Bont With: Liam Neeson, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Owen Wilson
Outline: When Eleanor, Theo, and Luke decide to take part in a sleep study at a huge mansion they get more than they bargained for when Dr. Marrow tells them of the house's ghostly past.

Name: Dracula 2000
Credit: Dir: Patrick Lussier With: Gerard Butler, Justine Waddell, Jonny Lee Miller
Outline: A group of thieves break into a chamber expecting to find paintings, but instead they release the count himself, who travels to New Orleans to find his nemesis' daughter, Mary Van Helsing.

Name: The Roommate
Credit: Dir: Christian E. Christiansen With: Minka Kelly, Leighton Meester, Cam Gigandet
Outline: When college freshman Sara arrives on campus for the first time, she befriends her roommate, Rebecca, unaware that the girl is becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

Name: The Spirit
Credit: Dir: Frank Miller With: Gabriel Macht, Samuel L. Jackson, Scarlett Johansson
Outline: Rookie cop Denny Colt returns from the beyond as The Spirit, a hero whose mission is to fight against the bad forces in Central City.

Name: The Unborn
Credit: Dir: David S. Goyer With: Odette Annable, Gary Oldman, Cam Gigandet
Outline: A young woman fights the spirit that is slowly taking possession of her.

Name: Texas Chainsaw 3D
Credit: Dir: John Luessenhop With: Alexandra Daddario, Tania Raymonde, Scott Eastwood
Outline: A young woman travels to Texas to collect an inheritance; little does she know that an encounter with a chainsaw-wielding killer is part of the reward.

Name: Elektra
Credit: Dir: Rob Bowman With: Jennifer Garner, Goran Visnjic, Will Yun Lee
Outline: Elektra the warrior survives a near-death experience, becomes an assassin-for-hire, and tries to protect her two latest targets, a single father and his young daughter, from a group of supernatural assassins.

Name: Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem
Credit: Dir: Colin Strause, Greg Strause With: Reiko Aylesworth, Steven Pasquale, Shareeka Epps
Outline: Warring alien and predator races descend on a small town, where unsuspecting residents must band together for any chance of survival.

Name: The Marine
Credit: Dir: John Bonito With: John Cena, Kelly Carlson, Robert Patrick
Outline: A group of diamond thieves on the run kidnap the wife of a recently discharged marine who goes on a chase through the South Carolinian wilderness to retrieve her.

Name: Jonah Hex
Credit: Dir: Jimmy Hayward With: Josh Brolin, Megan Fox, John Malkovich
Outline: The U.S. military makes a scarred bounty hunter with warrants on his own head an offer he cannot refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.

Name: The Boy Next Door
Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Jennifer Lopez, Ryan Guzman, Kristin Chenoweth
Outline: A recently cheated on married woman falls for a younger man who has moved in next door, but their torrid affair soon takes a dangerous turn.

Name: Psycho
Credit: Dir: Gus Van Sant With: Vince Vaughn, Anne Heche, Julianne Moore
Outline: A young female embezzeler arrives at the Bates Motel which has terrible secrets of its own.

Name: Superhero Movie
Credit: Dir: Craig Mazin With: Drake Bell, Leslie Nielsen, Sara Paxton
Outline: Orphaned high school student Rick Riker is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly, develops super powers (except for the ability to fly), and becomes a hero.

Name: The Butterfly Effect 2
Credit: Dir: John R. Leonetti With: Eric Lively, Erica Durance, Dustin Milligan
Outline: Nick Larson discovers a supernatural way to alter his life and travel back in time to key moments in his life by looking at photographs.
